title: Moderate: libxml2 security update
description:
The libxml2 library is a development toolbox providing the implementation of various XML standards.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
Additional Changes:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.7 Release Notes linked from the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2016-3709 is retrieved from Red Hat
